Package com.example.homeheirs

Class RecyclerViewAdapter.ViewHolder

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
com.example.homeheirs.RecyclerViewAdapter.ViewHolder
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.view.View.OnClickListener
Enclosing class:
RecyclerViewAdapter
public class RecyclerViewAdapter.ViewHolder extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
method that stores and recycles views as they are scrolled off screen The method also contains code that helps with getting selected items and adding them to the selecteditems array. It also plays a part in changing the selected items colors

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onClick(android.view.View view)
    method that implements what happens when item is clicked Depending on if the long_clciked is true (ie we are in selection mode), it will add clicked items to the selected items list.

  • Method Details

    • onClick

      public void onClick(android.view.View view)
      method that implements what happens when item is clicked Depending on if the long_clciked is true (ie we are in selection mode), it will add clicked items to the selected items list. Also plays role in changing rows color to dark when selected or normal when unselected
      Specified by:
      onClick in interface android.view.View.OnClickListener
      Parameters:
      view - - the actual list row
